title: Government contracts spur growth for Relative Dynamics
summary: “Since 2021 we have doubled in size annually in terms of people employed, projects and revenue," said Kush Patel, Relative Dynamics founder and CEO.

title: IM-1 lunar lander tipped over on its side
summary: The Intuitive Machines Nova-C lunar lander likely tipped over when touching down on the moon Feb. 22 and is now resting on its side.

title: IM’s Odysseus Lunar Lander Not Upright After All
summary: Intuitive Machines co-founder and CEO Steve Altemus told reporters this afternoon that initial indications yesterday that the Odysseus lander was upright on the lunar surface were wrong. Apparently it is […]

title: Flawless Photonics Kicking Glass
summary: Silicon Valley startup Flawless Photonics has produced more than 5 kilometers of ZBLAN on the International Space Station.

title: FAA to establish committee to refine launch licensing regulations
summary: The Federal Aviation Administration will establish a committee to get industry input on ways to improve a new launch licensing process, two years before all launch providers must switch to the new regulations.
